text: Psychedelic integration is the process of taking the insights and experiences from a psychedelic journey and applying them to your everyday life. This foundational practice helps you maintain the benefits of your experience.
text_with_breadcrumb:
Title: Integration Basics
Section: Introduction
Mentor: markkohl
KB: psychedelics
Content: Psychedelic integration is the process of taking the insights and experiences from a psychedelic journey and applying them to your everyday life. This foundational practice helps you maintain the benefits of your experience.

metadata.text: Psychedelic integration is the process of taking the insights and experiences from a psychedelic journey and applying them to your everyday life. This foundational practice helps you maintain the benefits of your experience.

text: The first 72 hours after a psychedelic experience are crucial for integration. During this time, the brain is still in a heightened state of neuroplasticity, making it easier to form new neural pathways and change old patterns.
text_with_breadcrumb:
Title: Integration Basics
Section: The First 72 Hours
Mentor: markkohl
KB: psychedelics
Content: The first 72 hours after a psychedelic experience are crucial for integration. During this time, the brain is still in a heightened state of neuroplasticity, making it easier to form new neural pathways and change old patterns.

metadata.text: The first 72 hours after a psychedelic experience are crucial for integration. During this time, the brain is still in a heightened state of neuroplasticity, making it easier to form new neural pathways and change old patterns.

text: Get plenty of sleep. Your brain needs time to process the experience. Avoid making major life decisions during this period.
text_with_breadcrumb:
Title: Integration Basics
Section: Rest and Recovery
Mentor: markkohl
KB: psychedelics
Content: Get plenty of sleep. Your brain needs time to process the experience. Avoid making major life decisions during this period.

text: Write down your experiences, insights, and any symbols or visions that stood out. These details can fade quickly, so capture them while they are fresh.
text_with_breadcrumb:
Title: Integration Basics
Section: Journaling
Mentor: markkohl
KB: psychedelics
Content: Write down your experiences, insights, and any symbols or visions that stood out. These details can fade quickly, so capture them while they are fresh.

text: Integration is not a one-time event but an ongoing process. Regular meditation, therapy, and community support can help maintain the benefits of your experience.
text_with_breadcrumb:
Title: Integration Basics
Section: Long-term Integration
Mentor: markkohl
KB: psychedelics
Content: Integration is not a one-time event but an ongoing process. Regular meditation, therapy, and community support can help maintain the benefits of your experience.
